page.title: 12NEW DEVELOPMENT,LOCAL GARAGE
page.content: THE NEW ESTATE The Cusworth View Estate is just being built,they started to build in 1983. The streets are going to be named after tanks because the site used to be a tank factory in World War Two. CAR- BODY REPAIR SHOP The Kennings building is 25 years old and is on Sprotbrough Road.There are 12 members of staff,Mr Stone is one of them.They do accident repairs and paint resprays. THE LOCAL GARAGE The Shell Garage is 24 years old.The manager is John Buckenham.There is a staff of 13.It sells about 4,000 Litres of petrol a day and sells cars.The working hours are between 8.30-5.30. They also do M.O.T. testing as well as repairs to vehicles.
